name: Get Billing Report
script:
import frappe
from frappe.utils import getdate

@frappe.whitelist()
def get_billing_report(entity_type, entity_name, start_date=None, end_date=None):
    filters = f"where billing_source = '{entity_type}' and {entity_type.lower()} = %s"
    args = [entity_name]

    if start_date and end_date:
        filters += " and creation between %s and %s"
        args.extend([start_date, end_date])

    results = frappe.db.sql(f'''
        select name, student, course, billing_status, invoice_reference, creation
        from `tabCourse Enrollment`
        {filters}
        order by creation desc
    ''', args, as_dict=True)

    return results
